casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eugene Tyrone MILLER. No. 453P02-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Eugene Tyrone Miller, for Miller, Eugene Tyrone. Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C. J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of July 2015 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
